In 2016, Kanye West was diagnosed with bipolar disorder after a psychiatric episode landed him in the hospital, but since then, hes openly talked about being on and off medications.

articles.author: Chris Molanphy
articles.title: How Taylor Swift's Midnights beat Drake and the Beatles' Billboard Hot 100 records. - Slate
articles.description: The Beatles’ record once seemed unbeatable. Then Swift doubled it. But this unprecedented debut was planned weeks in advance.
